Rule Name.defaultValue: AZT601.1 - Steal Managed Identity JsonWebToken - Virtual Machine IMDS Request - Azure Monitor Agent

properties.description: Will alert when a JWT for a VM is requested via IMDS. This requires the Azure Monitoring Agent on the endpoint and PowerShell scriptblock logging enabled.

allOf.query: union Event, Syslog | where EventID == 4104 and RenderedDescription has 'http://169.254.169.254/metadata/identity/oauth2/token' or SyslogMessage has 'http://169.254.169.254/metadata'
